ygData.subject: Not sure, but here's my guess for the new 45th level song
ygData.msgSnippet: This song looks like an AWESOME candidate to twist in with our Charm tactic.  However it comes awful late to be truely useful. 1)  Charm Mob 2)  Haste/buff mob
ygData.messageBody:
This song looks like an AWESOME candidate to twist in with our Charm tactic. However it comes awful late to be truely useful.

1) Charm Mob
2) Haste/buff mob w/1 song
3) Selo's

Rinse, Repeat

Even if the NPC your 'pet' is taking down is lower level this song will probably give it enough of a boost to win, almost every time.

I see a use, albeit a limited one.

Anyone else notice that we're going to need ANOTHER charm upgrade somewhere in the 50's? 39th will only take us to 49th level npc's.

Lyrnia


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
